lead_paragraph: Concern over Pemex’s finances has risen over the last week, after a leading national official warned that planned spending cuts could not be delayed.

headline.print_headline: Pemex Chief Steps Down as Oil Prices Keep Falling
headline.main: Chief of Pemex, Mexican Energy Giant, Steps Aside

snippet: Concern over Pemex’s finances has risen over the last week, after a leading national official warned that planned spending cuts could not be delayed.
abstract: Emilio Lozoya Austin steps down as chief executive of Mexico's state-owned oil company Pemex; will be replaced by Jose Antonio Gonzalez Anaya.
